TopicTitle: Cant attach Engines to fuel tanks

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

Hope someone can help, I had a break away from KSP but come back and I have updated my game and installed mods, however when im playing the game I have a lot of issues with attaching engines to my fuel tanks 

for example basic KW Rocketry SA-4 LFT I cannot connect any engine to it but I can connect the fuel tank to my pod, all that I get when I try to attach the engine is its transparent as it cannot find anything to attach it to.

Can anyone help me why this is happening

Thanks

Psi

Since, KSP 1.0, part stack node orientation definitions have changed, such that they're stricter than before.

You'll have to wait for Kyle and Winston to publish an update to KW Rocketry with the correct node directions, or you could go into the game debug menu (Alt-F12) and disable stack node orientation enforcement (not sure if that is the exact name).
KW updated with that fix already. You'll need to grab the latest version, which is 2.7 I think. Anything earlier will have this problem.
